articles.title: Actor calls on French film industry to face sexual abuse - Euronews
articles.description: Judith Godrèche accused directors Benoît Jacquot and Jacques Doillon of abuse including rape.
articles.content:
Judith Godrèche accused directors Benoît Jacquot and Jacques Doillon of abuse including rape.
